Package int3.team2.website.pantry_loogr.presentation

Class ItemsController

java.lang.Object
int3.team2.website.pantry_loogr.presentation.ItemsController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/items") public class ItemsController extends Object
Shows all the products that the user has or all the products in one of the user's pantryZones

  • Method Details

    • items

      @GetMapping public String items(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession, org.springframework.ui.Model model)

    • editItem

      @GetMapping("/editItem/{pantryId}/{productId}/{percentage}") public String editItem(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession, @PathVariable int pantryId, @PathVariable int productId, @PathVariable double percentage)
      Allows the user to change the amount contained in a product using the product and its location. i.e. if the user previously had a whole pack of spaghetti but used half, he can indicate that he used 50% of the pack and that information will be updated in the DB
      Parameters:
      httpSession - used to identify the user
      pantryId - used to know the location of the product
      productId - used to identify which product the user wants to change
      percentage - the percentage that is remaining
      Returns:
      redirects the user back to the items section

    • editItemQuantity

      @RequestMapping(value="/editItem", method=POST, consumes="application/x-www-form-urlencoded") public String editItemQuantity(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession, @RequestBody org.springframework.util.MultiValueMap<String,String> editData)
      Allows the user to edit the quantity of a product. i.e. if the user has a pack of spaghetti and buys another one, he can input 2 and that information will be updated in the DB
      Parameters:
      httpSession - used to identify the user
      editData - the new information about of the product that the user wants to update (id, location and new amount)
      Returns:
      redirects the user back to the items section

    • pantryZones

      @GetMapping("/pantry-zones") public String pantryZones(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession, org.springframework.ui.Model model)

    • pantryZoneDetails

      @GetMapping("/pantry-zones/{pantryZoneID}") public String pantryZoneDetails(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession, org.springframework.ui.Model model, @PathVariable int pantryZoneID)

    • addPantryZone

      @RequestMapping(value="/addPantryZone", method=POST, consumes="application/x-www-form-urlencoded") public String addPantryZone(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession, @RequestBody org.springframework.util.MultiValueMap<String,String> pantryZoneData)
